DOC.brief_title: The Effect Ultrasound Orthodontic Tooth Movement
DOC.detailed_description: The study involve compare effect tooth movement without ultrasound treatment split mouth design . Treatment consist use Aevo System™ device one 20 minute period per day duration trial ( 24 week ) . Tooth position measurement take eligible patient prior commence usage study device . Follow-up visit schedule intra-oral clinical measurement take full-arch impression . The Aevo System™ consist ultrasound emit mouthpiece wire connect external handheld device . The mouthpiece place teeth brace every day 20 minute order deliver therapy .
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet follow criterion qualify entry study : 1 . Scheduled receive orthodontic treatment early stage orthodontic treatment 2 . Minimum 3 mm extraction space ( side dental arch ) close either distal movement 6 anterior teeth canine canine distal movement canine . 3 . Available followup visit . 4 . Willing able sign write informed consent . 5 . Healthy . 6 . Has permanent dentition age 12 40 . 7 . Good oral hygiene compliance Subjects meet follow criterion exclude study : 1 . Any compromised medical dental condition prevents subject participate trial use medical device . 2 . Any implanted assistive device . 3 . Currently involve study . 4 . Lives significantly outside clinical trial site . 5 . Use bisphosphonates . 6 . Pregnant female .
